channel.title: Any body can help
channel.description:
hello thanks for reading this :)
ive downloaded a cuople of servers and ive downloaded java and done the correct instructions to set enviorment variables and my compiling and trying to run the server/client it says java is not reconized but ive followed all the correct things ive done it right but nothing happends so ive deleted my enviorment and seeking if any 1 can team view with me and help me out ill be so greatful thanks :) :D :D :D :eek:

item.title: Any body can help
item.dc:creator: @xX_CoDeR_AJ xX CoDeR AJ
item.description:
@xX_CoDeR_AJ wrote:

You can also try this for the compiler.

@echo off Title Compiler if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

Read full topic

item.title: Any body can help
item.dc:creator: @Kono-chan Kono-chan
item.description:
@Kono-chan wrote:

Try replacing the “java” with the path to the java.exe file?

Read full topic
